column1: Master of Science (Technology) in Computing Sciences and Electrical Engineering - Software, Web & Cloud
column5: Join us in creating the new digital worldComputers and software are an integral part of our daily lives. Interaction between people and computers takes new forms as computers are integrated into different systems from mobile devices to clouds. Come study with us and become a creator of the new digital
